C14414C616014EE5B18BE92373877BF7.description: Design a speculative budget for adult life while considering: prospective income of desired career path; taxation; cost (e.g., mortgage, land tax, maintenance) of purchasing or renting a home in a desired location; • transportation costs; recreation costs; and, other anticipated costs relevant to maintaining a home and desired lifestyle.
